name: SellBizToday
tag_list: broker, brokers, business-for-sale, business-opportunities, business-valuation, businesses-for-sale, buy-a-business, buying-a-business, convenience-stores-for-sale, franchise, franchise-for-sale, franchises, franchisor, home-business, new-business-online,
overview:
SellBizToday.com is a Multinational Business for Sale Listing Website that creates an online marketing environment that is beneficial for business buyers, sellers, brokers, and franchises.

This company provides social media advertising services to business brokers and franchise brokers to list their businesses online and sell their businesses and franchises. Methods of advertising include Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Craigslist, Google, MySpace and YouTube.

external_links.title: SellBizToday Announces Social Networking Strategy For Buying and Selling Businesses Online
